title: List of C-SPAN Q&A interviews first aired in 2016
text: <a href="Q%26amp%3BA%20%28U.S.%20talk%20show%29">Q&A</a> is an interview series on the <a href="C-SPAN">C-SPAN</a> <a href="television%20network">network</a> that typically airs every Sunday night. It is hosted by C-SPAN founder <a href="Brian%20Lamb">Brian Lamb</a>. Its stated purpose is to feature discussions with "interesting people who are making things happen in politics, the media, education, and science & technology in hour-long conversations about their lives and their work."
